properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 3:09PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Grand Isle County.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult later tonight and
especially for the morning commute on Thursday. Areas of
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause
drifting snow on Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will overspread the warning area later
tonight and become heavy during the early morning hours on
Thursday. Snow intensity will decrease by late morning with
snowfall tapering off during the afternoon hours.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
